parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the balancer chain tensioner can cause catastrophic engine damage, leading to engine seizure, and potentially resulting in a crash.
symptoms: The engine makes a rapping or unusual noise
the balancer chain tensioner spring breaks

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch system can cause the vehicle to lunge forward when in neutral, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle lunges forward when shifted into neutral
and the clutch must be held in to prevent the vehicle from lunging forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler shaft spring can cause the balancer chain to become loose, leading to engine and final drive system lock-up, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: and the engine and final drive system lock up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the motorcycle to start in gear with the neutral light on, leading to accidents or injuries, and can also cause the fuses to blow, resulting in loss of instrument panel lights, headlights, and neutral light.
symptoms: The motorcycle starts in gear with the neutral light on
instrument panel lights and headlights go off
and the neutral light remains on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration of the rear view mirror can cause the driver to lose visibility of the rearview, which can increase the risk of accidents or collisions.
symptoms: The rear view mirror vibrates excessively
making it difficult or impossible to see the rearview
